template.name: ftp_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the ftp module.

desc.p: This template allows ftpd to manage files in a user home directory, creating files with the correct type.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

interface.name: ftp_tcp_connect
interface.summary: Use ftp by connecting over TCP. (Deprecated)

interface.name: ftp_check_exec
interface.summary: Execute FTP daemon entry point programs.

interface.name: ftp_domtrans_ftpdctl
interface.summary: Execute the ftpdctl program in the ftpdctl domain.

desc.p: Allow ftp servers to modify public files used for public file transfer services.
Allow ftp servers to login to local users and read/write all files on the system, governed by DAC.
Allow ftp servers to use cifs used for public file transfer services.
Allow ftp servers to use nfs used for public file transfer services.
Allow ftp to read and write files in the user home directories
